mapper.select: select word_no no, word_name name, word_count count, word_create_date createDate from search_word where word_name = #{value}
select word_name from search_word where word_name like '%' || #{value} || '%' order by word_count desc
select word_name from search_word order by word_count desc

select j.jisikin_no no, j.jisikin_title title, j.jisikin_content contents, j.jisikin_secret_yn secretYn, j.jisikin_mental_point mentalPoint, c.category_no categoryno, c.category_name categoryname, j.jisikin_viewcnt viewCnt, j.jisikin_create_date createDate, a.answer_no answerNo, a.answer_contents answerContents from jisikin j, jisikin_category c, jisikin_answer a where j.category_no = c.category_no and j.jisikin_no = a.jisikin_no and (j.jisikin_title like '%' || #{value} || '%' or j.jisikin_content like '%' || #{value} || '%')

select boardNo, title, contents, boardMainImg, blogTitle, blogNo, createDate, categoryNo from (select d.board_title title, d.board_no boardNo, d.board_contents contents, a.BLOG_NO blogNo, a.BLOG_TITLE blogTitle, d.board_main_Img boardMainImg, d.board_create_date createDate, e.category_no categoryNo from blog a, blog_boards d, blog_category e, blog_subcategory f where f.blog_no = a.blog_no and f.subcategory_no = e.subcategory_no and e.category_no = d.category_no ) where (title like '%' || #{value} || '%' or contents like '%' || #{value} || '%')

select vod_no no, vod_img img, vod_title title, vod_create_date createDate, vod_description descriptrion, vod_running_time runningTime, vod_grade grade, vod_actor actor from series_vods where (vod_title like '%' || #{value} || '%' or vod_description like '%' || #{value} || '%')

select TV_NO no, TV_TITLE title, TV_CONTENTS contents, TV_VIEWS views, TV_VIDEONAME videoName, CREATE_DATE createDate, b.PLAYLIST_NO "tvPlaylist.no", TV_PLAYTIME playTime, TV_THUMBNAIL thumbnail, b.CHANNEL_NO "tvPlaylist.tvChannel.no", PLAYLIST_TITLE "tvPlaylist.title", CHANNEL_TITLE "tvPlaylist.tvChannel.title" from tv a, TV_PLAYLIST b,tv_channel c where a.PLAYLIST_NO = b.PLAYLIST_NO and b.channel_no = c.channel_no and (tv_title like '%' || #{value} || '%' or tv_contents like '%' || #{value} || '%')

select w.WRITE_NO writeNo, w.BAND_NO bandNo, b.band_name bandName, w.WRITE_CONTENTS contents, b.band_create_date createDate from BAND_WRITE w, BAND b where w.band_no = b.band_no and (w.write_contents like '%' || #{value} || '%' or b.band_name like '%' || #{value} || '%')
